pages.text: The Altar is a multiblock structure used for crafting. You can view its structure in JEI. Forming Altar requires player to have $(l:overview/power_point)Power$().

pages.name: Altar
pages.text: Use $(l:overview/gohei_and_danmaku)Gohei$() on the front side of the red wool at the left of the 4th level will complete the creation.

You can place items in the altar by right-clicking on the top of those oak pillars. To remove items, right-click those pillars with empty hand instead. $(br2)When all items are in place and player has enough Power, the crafting will begin. $(br2) Insufficient Power will cause the crafing to pause; once you have enough Power, the process can be resumed by right-clicking again.

pages.title: Altar Crafting
pages.text: Crafting lighting bolts. Note that all recipes are shapeless/unordered.
